alert.note: Alert for Eastern Preston; Marion; Monongalia; Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston; Wetzel (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 09 at 7:24PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM EDT THURSDAY THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of northern West Virginia, including the following areas, Eastern Preston, Marion, Monongalia, Preston, Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston and Wetzel. * WHEN...From 4 AM EDT Thursday through Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Preston; Marion; Monongalia; Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston; Wetzel
